text_extraction.headline: 24/7 Support
text_extraction.subheadline: Get help whenever you need it.
body_copy: Iâ€™m excited that race day is nearly here! Thanks for all of your help so far ğŸ˜Š. How many gels do you think I need to take? Iâ€™ve been practising and Iâ€™m not sure I can handle more than two ğŸ˜¬

Hey Dom, great question. Normally Iâ€™d say you want to take at least 3 gels an hour, so probably 10 in total for your marathon. That said, if your stomach canâ€™t handle more than a couple of gels, you can always try real foods instead, like bananas and peanut butter.
